translations: 醒来，唤醒；唤起（记忆）（wake 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: We spoke quietly for fear of waking the guards.
sentences.translation: 我们悄悄说话，以免惊醒警卫。

sentences.sentence: I can't get out of the habit of waking at six in the morning.
sentences.translation: 我早上六点钟醒的习惯改不了。

sentences.sentence: Imagine waking up and finding the value of your assets has been halved.
sentences.translation: 想象一下，你一觉醒来发现自己资产的价值缩水了一半。
